anathema: Reveal secrets of the dead to nonbelievers, despoil grave markers
area_of_concern_raw: Ghouls, graves, secrets kept by the dead
edict: Eat the flesh of your own kind
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Kabriri (Him Who Gnaws)](/Deities.aspx?ID=432)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 304

Kabriri, Him Who Gnaws, is the demon lord of [ghouls](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=419), graves, and secrets kept by the dead. According to legend, Kabriri is the reborn form of the first humanoid to ever devour his kin in life. His realm, Everglut, is connected to graveyards throughout [the multiverse](/Rules.aspx?ID=2988) by a snarled network of tunnels that bring knowledge and sacrifices to the demon lord. Kabriri appears as a hulking ghoul with [elven](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=60) ears, teeth filed to points, an unnaturally long tongue, ashen skin, and cloven hooves. He is worshipped primarily by ghouls and [ghasts](/Monsters.aspx?ID=219).

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Eat the flesh of your own kind

**Anathema** Reveal secrets of the dead to nonbelievers, despoil grave markers

**Area of Concern**
Ghouls, graves, secrets kept by the dead

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48)

**Favored Weapon** [jaw](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356) or [Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=374)

**Domains** [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=79), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Undeath](/Domains.aspx?ID=97), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=123)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=1580)

- **2nd**
[Expeditious Excavation](/Spells.aspx?ID=2349)

- **3rd**
[Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=1622)

</column>
name: Kabriri (Him Who Gnaws)
